title: Ghost in the Lore
description: A hidden traitor. Two deadly artifacts.After many travails, Caina has reached the ancient city of Iramis, where the power and wisdom of the loremasters will protect the necromantic Sword and Dagger of the Iron King.But a traitor lurks within the mighty walls of Iramis.And this betrayer might undo everything Caina has done...
author: Jonathan Moeller
